entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 22.
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Showers beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 22. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
